subject: how to test private methods
msgSnippet: Hi, I am testing java programs using JUnit fraewotk. In part of my job I am getting the problems with testing private methods. I am not using SuiteRunner tool.
messageBody:
Hi,
I am testing java programs using JUnit fraewotk. In part of my job I
am getting the problems with testing private methods.
I am not using SuiteRunner tool. When I am testing private method in
JUnit using PrivilegedAccessor class, some times I am getting the
problem like NoSuchMethodException and sometimes getting NullPointer
Exception. my program code is below.
can u please help me how to write the JUnit testcase

MyActual code

private String getRandomString(String column, FilteredRowSet rs,
Integer min,
Integer max) throws Exception {
int currentRecord;
String columnData = null;
currentRecord = rs.getRow();
do {
// rs.absolute(generateRandomNumberBetweenRange(
min, max));
columnData = rs.getString(column);
} while (columnData == null || columnData.trim()
== "");
rs.absolute(currentRecord);

return columnData;
}

I have testcase for this code:

public void testGetRandomString(){

try{
frs.setCommand("select * from CONTACT_INFOS");
frs.execute();
frs.last();
int maximum_rec = frs.getRow();
contactinfoscrambler = new
ContactInfoScrambler();
Class c = ContactInfoScrambler.class;


String column="FIRST_NAME";
int minimum = 1;

// Class[] classTypes=
{String.class,javax.sql.rowset.FilteredRowSet.class,java.lang.Integer.
class,java.lang.Integer.class};
Object[] arg ={new String(),new
FilteredRowSetImpl(),new java.lang.Integer(1),new java.lang.Integer
(1)};
Object rt=null;

if(c!=null)
{
System.out.println("
from : "+c.getName());
rt=PrivilegedAccessor.invokeMethod(
c,"getRandomString",arg );
}
System.out.println("Success");
String data=(String)rt;
System.out.println("value : "+rt);
System.out.println("value : "+data);

assertNotNull(rt);
}
catch(Exception e){
e.printStackTrace();
}

output of testcase:
